short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhistleX is a tool that reads articles for you. Just go on a website (blog, news, education, etc.), press play and enjoy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhistleX is a free Google Chrome extension that automatically reads articles for you. Just go on your favorite web site (blog, news, education, lectures, etc.), press play and enjoy listening.


WhistleX reads only the important text on a website (no adds, no unimportant text) and does it automatically when you press the play button. WhistleX saves your time and makes it easier for you to absorb information.
